comments: First column of inverse Stolarsky array.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
C. Kimberling, Interspersions and dispersions, Proceedings of the American Mathematical Society, 117 (1993) 313-321.
N. J. A. Sloane, My favorite integer sequences, in Sequences and their Applications (Proceedings of SETA '98).
N. J. A. Sloane, Classic Sequences
formula: Satisfies a(a(n)) = a(n) + n. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 14 2006
maple: A007067:=n->round(n*(1+sqrt(5))/2); seq(A007067(n), n=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 27 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A000201, A007064. Different from A026355.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
